Key Match Events: Jeffrey Vandersay took six wickets for 33, helping Sri Lanka to a 32-run win over India.
Rohit Sharma scored 64 off 44 balls but was dismissed by a reverse sweep off Vandersay.
India collapsed to 147 for six, with six wickets falling for 50 runs in 10 overs.
KL Rahul lasted just two balls before being bowled by Mohammed Siraj.
Axar Patel played smart cricket and milked 38 runs for the seventh wicket with Washington Sundar.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka now leads the three-match series 1-0 after the first match ended in a tie.
Indian spinners led by Washington put the Lankan batters through a test of skill, but the hosts found enough fight from their late order to make an acceptable 240 for nine.
